trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the XML language-related attributes of a <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.

This class implements attached property support for <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlNamespaceMaps%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlnsDefinition%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlnsDictionary%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlSpace%2A>.

These properties are generally only used by the WPF XAML parser implementation for [!INCLUDE[net_v30_short](~/add/includes/net-v30-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/add/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)].
Actual user code attached property calls from XAML markup is not the primary scenario.

The properties are implemented as attached properties primarily so that the properties can better support the property inheritance concept for dependency properties through all possible object graphs.
As such, this is really an infrastructure support class.
For more information, see [Property Value Inheritance](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlNamespaceMaps*> attached property of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
The object to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlNamespaceMaps*> property from.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlNamespaceMaps*> property for the specified object.
dependencyObject is .
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlnsDefinition*> attached property of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
The object to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlnsDefinition*> attached property value from.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlnsDefinition*> attached property for the specified object.
dependencyObject is .
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlnsDictionary*> attached property of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
The object to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlnsDictionary*> attached property value from.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlnsDictionary*> attached property for the specified object.
dependencyObject is .
Gets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlSpace*> attached property of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
The object to obtain the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlSpace*> attached property value from.
The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlSpace*> attached property for the specified object.
dependencyObject is .
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlNamespaceMaps*> attached property of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
The object on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlNamespaceMaps*> attached property.
The string value to set.
dependencyObject is .
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlnsDefinition*> attached property of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
The object on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlnsDefinition*> property.
The XML namespace definition in string form.
dependencyObject is .
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlnsDictionary*> attached property of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
The object on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlnsDictionary*> attached property.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_xmlns" name="xmlns" href=""></xref> dictionary in string form.
dependencyObject is .
Sets the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlSpace*> attached property of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
The object on which to set the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.XmlAttributeProperties.XmlSpace*> attached property.
The string to use for an XML space.
dependencyObject is .
